product_name: CamelBak Big Bite Valve - Package of 3
long_description: Keep your CamelBak hydration reservoir (sold separately) working at its best with this package of 3 Camelbak Big Bite(TM) valves. Valve self-seals after each drink to eliminate annoying drips. 1-piece silicone design has no moving parts to break; silicone is BPA free. Package includes 3 fun colors of the CamelBak Big Bite valve.
short_description: Keep your CamelBak hydration reservoir (sold separately) working at its best with this package of 3 Camelbak Big Bite(TM) valves.
